SUSTAINABLE DEVELOPMENT GOALSThe Andersons have not yet completed 
an estimate of our Scope 3 GHG 
emissions. Intuitively, we believe the 
majority of our upstream Scope 3 
emissions will come from our farmer 
suppliers, as is generally the case for 
others in our industry. This is an emission 
source best estimated by proxy and will 
take some time to refine as we partner 
with our suppliers and others. We hope 
to include more information in the future 
as we continue to evaluate our impact 
in order to determine the best path 
forward. We intend to provide solutions 
to our customers through product 
innovation and to continue to work with 
our trusted farmer suppliers to bring
